name: Elefightor: Going Up!
description:
Elefightor: Going Up! Is a casual competitive 2D fighting game with 50s inspired cartoon themed visuals.

Key Features
  • Physics-based player movement (swinging with inertia).
  • Player abilities creating a rock, paper scissors dynamic.
  • 50s inspired cartoon theme.
  • Selectable elevators (serving as player avatar).
Additional Information

This game was created in 8 weeks by a group of 1st year Game Design students at Uppsala University - Campus Gotland for showcase at the Gotland Game Conference 2018 with a non-standard input, this is a keyboard build of the game.

  • Alexander Ebbesson - Project Manager & Sound Design
  • Roberto Marcos Söderström - Game Design & Art
  • Samantha Baqués Velásquez - Art
  • Gunnlaugur Arnarson - Art, Music & Sound Design
  • Émile Sohier - Code
  • Basil Gerard - Code

This game is considered complete, it may or may not receive future updates (mainly due to the availability of the development team). 

Thank you so much for checking out our first game!
